sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INC_CARGA_PUNTA_CONSU ( NUM_LOTE, COD_CLIE, NUM_CONC, NUM_PUNT, COD_MOTI, MEN_ERRO, IND_CARG, IND_APLI, FEC_PROC, COD_USUR,COD_PERI) VALUES ( #numeroLote#,#codigoCliente# ,#numeroConcurso# , TO_NUMBER(#numeroPuntaje#,'999999.9999'),#codigoMotivo# ,#mensajeError# , #indicadorCarga#,#indicadorAplicacion#,SYSDATE ,#codigoUsuario#, TRUNC(TO_NUMBER(#codigoPeriodo#,'999999.99')))
sqlMap.update: UPDATE INC_CARGA_PUNTA_CONSU SET IND_APLI = '1', FEC_PROC = SYSDATE WHERE NUM_LOTE = #numeroLote# AND IND_CARG='1'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INC_CUENT_CORRI_PUNTO ( OID_CUEN_CORR_PUNT, NUM_MOVI, NUM_PUNT, NUM_PUNT_EXIG, FEC_MOVI, COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL, CLIE_OID_CLIE, PERD_OID_PERI, TMOV_OID_TIPO_MOVI, FEC_ULTI_ACTU, VAL_DESC) SELECT INC_CUCP_SEQ.NEXTVAL,INC_CUCP_SEQ.NEXTVAL,A.NUM_PUNT, 0, TO_DATE(SYSDATE), (SELECT X.OID_PARA_GRAL FROM INC_CONCU_PARAM_GENER X WHERE X.NUM_CONC = A.NUM_CONC AND X.IND_ACTI='1') OID_PARA_GRAL, GEN_PKG_GENER.GEN_FN_DEVUELVE_ID_CLIENTE(A.COD_CLIE), GEN_PKG_GENER.GEN_FN_DEVUELVE_ID_CRA_PERIO2(#codigoPeriodo#), CASE WHEN A.NUM_PUNT >= 0 THEN '1' ELSE '2' END AS OID_TIPO_MOVI, SYSDATE, (SELECT B.DES_MOTI_CARG_PUNT FROM INC_MOTIV_CARGA_PUNTA B WHERE B.COD_MOTI_CARG_PUNT = A.COD_MOTI) AS DES_MOTI FROM INC_CARGA_PUNTA_CONSU A WHERE A.NUM_LOTE =#numeroLote# AND A.IND_APLI ='1' AND A.IND_CARG='1'
sqlMap.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.NUM_LOTE, 9, 4)) + 1, 1), 4, '0') AS NUM_LOTE FROM INC_CARGA_PUNTA_CONSU A
SELECT COUNT(1) AS NUMREG FROM INC_REPOR_ESTAD_PREMI_DESPA A WHERE A.TIP_CIERR = #tipoCierre# AND to_char(a.FEC_proc,'dd/MM/yyyy') = #fechaProceso#
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM INC_CONTR_CARGA_ECM WHERE COD_PERI = #codigoPeriodo# AND IND_ESTA = '1'

SELECT OID_CONT_CARG, COD_PERI, TO_CHAR(FEC_PROC,'DD/MM/YYYY') FEC_PROC, VAL_CANT_CONS_PROC, VAL_CANT_POSI_PROC, IND_ESTA, DECODE(IND_ESTA, '1', 'Procesado','2','Anulado') DES_ESTA FROM INC_CONTR_CARGA_ECM ORDER BY COD_PERI DESC, FEC_PROC DESC
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.NUM_LOTE, 9, 4)) + 1, 1), 4, '0') AS NUM_LOTE FROM INC_BOLSA_ATEND A
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INC_BOLSA_ATEND ( NUM_LOTE, COD_CLIE, NUM_CONC, FEC_SOLU, COD_USUR, MEN_ERRO, IND_CARG, VAL_OBSE) VALUES ( #numeroLote#,#codigoCliente# ,#numeroConcurso# , SYSDATE, #codigoUsuario# ,#mensajeError# , #indicadorCarga#,#observaciones#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT con.OID_PARA_GRAL CODIGO, con.NUM_CONC || ' - ' || con.VAL_NOMB DESCRIPCION, con.NUM_CONC FROM INC_BOLSA_FALTA bol, PED_SOLIC_POSIC pos, PED_SOLIC_CABEC cab, INC_CONCU_PARAM_GENER con WHERE bol.FEC_SOLU IS NULL AND bol.SOPO_OID_SOLI_POSI = pos.OID_SOLI_POSI AND pos.SOCA_OID_SOLI_CABE = cab.OID_SOLI_CABE AND cab.COPA_OID_PARA_GENE = con.OID_PARA_GRAL ORDER BY 2

SELECT DISTINCT psc.PERD_OID_PERI as CODIGO, COR.COD_PERI as DESCRIPCION FROM INC_BOLSA_FALTA bol, PED_SOLIC_CABEC psc, PED_SOLIC_POSIC psp, PED_TIPO_SOLIC_PAIS tsp, PED_TIPO_SOLIC ts, CRA_PERIO cra, SEG_PERIO_CORPO cor WHERE psc.COPA_OID_PARA_GENE = #oidConcurso# AND psp.SOCA_OID_SOLI_CABE = psc.OID_SOLI_CABE AND psc.TSPA_OID_TIPO_SOLI_PAIS = tsp.OID_TIPO_SOLI_PAIS AND tsp.TSOL_OID_TIPO_SOLI = ts.OID_TIPO_SOLI AND ts.COD_TIPO_SOLI in ('SIFC', 'SINC', 'SIN') AND psp.OID_SOLI_POSI = bol.SOPO_OID_SOLI_POSI AND psc.PERD_OID_PERI = cra.OID_PERI AND cra.PERI_OID_PERI = cor.OID_PERI AND bol.FEC_SOLU IS NULL ORDER BY 2

SELECT DISTINCT psp.PROD_OID_PROD as CODIGO, pro.COD_SAP as DESCRIPCION FROM INC_BOLSA_FALTA bol, PED_SOLIC_CABEC psc, PED_SOLIC_POSIC psp, PED_TIPO_SOLIC_PAIS tsp, PED_TIPO_SOLIC ts, MAE_PRODU pro WHERE psc.COPA_OID_PARA_GENE = #oidConcurso#
psc.PERD_OID_PERI = #oidPeriodo#
AND psp.SOCA_OID_SOLI_CABE = psc.OID_SOLI_CABE AND psc.TSPA_OID_TIPO_SOLI_PAIS = tsp.OID_TIPO_SOLI_PAIS AND tsp.TSOL_OID_TIPO_SOLI = ts.OID_TIPO_SOLI AND ts.COD_TIPO_SOLI in ('SIFC', 'SINC', 'SIN') AND psp.OID_SOLI_POSI = bol.SOPO_OID_SOLI_POSI AND psp.PROD_OID_PROD = pro.OID_PROD AND bol.FEC_SOLU IS NULL ORDER BY 2

SELECT DISTINCT A.OID_PARA_GRAL CODIGO, A.NUM_CONC ||' - ' || A.VAL_NOMB DESCRIPCION, A.NUM_CONC FROM INC_CONCU_PARAM_GENER A,INC_VERSI_CONCU B WHERE A.OID_PARA_GRAL = B.COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL AND B.VICO_OID_VIGE_CONC IN (1,2) ORDER BY 3

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CANTIDAD FROM inc_param_nivel_premi np, inc_param_gener_premi gp, inc_ganad ga WHERE np.pagp_oid_para_gene_prem = gp.oid_para_gene_prem AND np.oid_para_nive_prem = ga.panp_oid_para_nive_prem AND gp.copa_oid_para_gral = #oidConcurso#
SELECT INC_SECP_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INC_TMP_CARGA_PREMI(OID_TMP_CARG_PREMI, COD_CONC, VAL_NIVE, NUM_PREM, COD_SAP, NUM_UNID, OID_SEC_CARG_PREMI) VALUES(INC_TMCP_SEQ.nextval, #codigoConcurso#, TRUNC(TO_NUMBER(#numeroNivel#,'9999.99')), TRUNC(TO_NUMBER(#numeroPremio#,'9999.99')), #codigoSAP#, TRUNC(TO_NUMBER(#numeroUnidad#,'999.99')), #oidSecuencia#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT p.cod_conc, TO_CHAR(p.val_nive) val_nive, TO_CHAR(p.num_prem) num_premi, p.cod_sap, p.cod_erro FROM INC_TMP_CARGA_PREMI p WHERE p.oid_sec_carg_premi = #oidSecuencia# AND p.cod_erro IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.val_nive

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM inc_param_gener_premi pgp, inc_param_nivel_premi pnp, inc_premi_artic pa, inc_lote_premi_artic lpa, inc_artic_lote al WHERE pgp.oid_para_gene_prem = pnp.pagp_oid_para_gene_prem AND pnp.oid_para_nive_prem = pa.panp_oid_para_nive_prem AND pa.oid_prem_arti = lpa.prar_oid_prem_arti AND lpa.oid_lote_prem_arti = al.lopa_oid_lote_prem_arti AND pgp.copa_oid_para_gral = #oidConcurso#

SELECT DISTINCT A.OID_PARA_GRAL CODIGO, A.NUM_CONC ||' - ' || A.VAL_NOMB DESCRIPCION, A.NUM_CONC FROM INC_CONCU_PARAM_GENER A,INC_VERSI_CONCU B, INC_PLANT_CONCU C WHERE A.OID_PARA_GRAL = B.COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL AND A.IND_ACTI = 1 AND B.VICO_OID_VIGE_CONC = 1 AND A.BCAL_OID_BASE_CALC IN (1,2) AND A.PLC2_OID_PLAN_CONC = C.OID_PLAN_CONC AND NVL(C.IND_PROD_EXIG, 0) = 1 ORDER BY 3

SELECT c.IND_DIGI, c.IND_IMPR_GP, f.COD_ESTR FROM pre_matri_factu_cabec a, pre_ofert b, pre_ofert_detal c, mae_produ d, pre_matri_factu e, pre_estra f WHERE a.oid_cabe = b.mfca_oid_cabe AND b.oid_ofer = c.ofer_oid_ofer AND c.prod_oid_prod = d.oid_prod AND c.oid_deta_ofer = e.ofde_oid_deta_ofer AND e.mfca_oid_cabe = a.oid_cabe AND b.coes_oid_estr = f.oid_estr AND a.perd_oid_peri = #oidPeriodo# AND c.val_codi_vent = #codigoVenta#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INC_DESPA_CORXP_CABEC ( PAIS_OID_PAIS, PERD_OID_PERI, COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL, IND_ACTI) VALUES ( #oidPais#, #oidPeriodo#, #oidConcurso#, '1')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE INC_DESPA_CORXP_CABEC SET COD_MENS = #codigoMensaje# WHERE PAIS_OID_PAIS = #oidPais# AND PERD_OID_PERI = #oidPeriodo# AND COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL = #oidConcurso#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INC_DESPA_CORXP_DETAL ( PAIS_OID_PAIS, PERD_OID_PERI, COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL, COD_VENT) VALUES ( #oidPais#, #oidPeriodo#, #oidConcurso#, #codigoVenta# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM INC_DESPA_CORXP_DETAL WHERE PAIS_OID_PAIS = #oidPais# AND PERD_OID_PERI = #oidPeriodo# AND COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL = #oidConcurso#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COD_VENT FROM INC_DESPA_CORXP_DETAL WHERE PAIS_OID_PAIS = #oidPais# AND PERD_OID_PERI = #oidPeriodo# AND COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL = #oidConcurso# ORDER BY 1
SELECT IND_ACTI FROM INC_DESPA_CORXP_CABEC WHERE PAIS_OID_PAIS = #oidPais# AND PERD_OID_PERI = #oidPeriodo# AND COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL = #oidConcurso#
SELECT INC_PKG_PROCE_INCEN.INC_FN_VALID_DESPA_CORXP(#codigoPais#, #codigoPeriodo#, #oidConcurso#) FROM DUAL

SELECT DISTINCT D.NUM_CONC CODIGO, D.NUM_CONC || ' - ' || D.VAL_NOMB DESCRIPCION FROM INC_BOLSA_FALTA A, INC_CONCU_PARAM_GENER D WHERE A.FEC_SOLU IS NULL AND A.COPA_OID_PARA_GENE = D.OID_PARA_GRAL GROUP BY NUM_CONC, VAL_NOMB ORDER BY NUM_CONC DESC

SELECT DISTINCT A.VAL_CODI_VENT_FICT CODIGO, E.COD_SAP || ' - ' || A.VAL_CODI_VENT_FICT || ' - ' || DES.VAL_I18N DESCRIPCION FROM INC_BOLSA_FALTA A, INC_CONCU_PARAM_GENER D, MAE_PRODU E, GEN_I18N_SICC_PAIS DES WHERE A.FEC_SOLU IS NULL AND A.COPA_OID_PARA_GENE = D.OID_PARA_GRAL AND E.OID_PROD = A.PROD_OID_PROD AND DES.VAL_OID=A.PROD_OID_PROD AND DES.ATTR_ENTI = 'MAE_PRODU' AND D.NUM_CONC = #value#

SELECT ral.OID_REEM_ARTI_LOTE CODIGO, pro.COD_SAP || ' - ' || ral.COD_VENT_FICT || ' - ' || PQ_APL_AUX.Valor_Gen_I18n_Sicc(1, pro.OID_PROD, 'MAE_PRODU') || ' - ' || DECODE(NVL(COD_TIPO_AGRU, 'I'),'I','Individual','Compuesta') DESCRIPCION FROM INC_CONCU_PARAM_GENER cpg, INC_PARAM_GENER_PREMI pgp, INC_PARAM_NIVEL_PREMI pnp, INC_PREMI_ARTIC pa, INC_LOTE_PREMI_ARTIC lpa, INC_ARTIC_LOTE al, MAE_PRODU pro, INC_REEMP_ARTIC_LOTE ral WHERE cpg.OID_PARA_GRAL = pgp.COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL AND pgp.OID_PARA_GENE_PREM = pnp.PAGP_OID_PARA_GENE_PREM AND pnp.OID_PARA_NIVE_PREM = pa.PANP_OID_PARA_NIVE_PREM AND pa.OID_PREM_ARTI = lpa.PRAR_OID_PREM_ARTI AND lpa.OID_LOTE_PREM_ARTI = al.LOPA_OID_LOTE_PREM_ARTI AND al.OID_ARTI_LOTE = ral.ARLO_OID_ARTI_LOTE AND ral.PROD_OID_PROD = pro.OID_PROD AND ral.IND_ACTI = 1 AND ral.COMP_OID_REEM_ARTI_LOTE is Null AND cpg.NUM_CONC = #value# ORDER BY 2
SELECT DISTINCT A.NUM_CONC CODIGO, A.NUM_CONC ||' - ' || A.VAL_NOMB DESCRIPCION FROM INC_CONCU_PARAM_GENER A WHERE A.IND_ACTI = 1 AND A.BCAL_OID_BASE_CALC IN (1,2) ORDER BY 1 DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INC_CARGA_MIGRA_PUNTO ( NUM_CARG, NUM_FILA, COD_CLIE, FEC_CARG, COD_USUA) VALUES (#numeroCarga#, #numeroFila#, #codigoCliente#, SYSDATE, #codigoUsuario#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(NUM_CARG) + 1, 1) AS NUM_CARGA FROM (SELECT NUM_CARG FROM INC_CARGA_MIGRA_PUNTO UNION SELECT NUM_CARG FROM INC_MIGRA_PUNTO_AMBIT) A

SELECT car.NUM_FILA, car.COD_CLIE, car.COD_MOTI, mot.DES_MOTI FROM INC_CARGA_MIGRA_PUNTO car, INC_MOTIV_MIGRA_PUNTO mot WHERE car.NUM_CARG = #numeroCarga# AND car.COD_MOTI = mot.COD_MOTI ORDER BY car.NUM_FILA
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INC_MIGRA_PUNTO_AMBIT (NUM_CARG, OID_REGI, OID_ZONA) VALUES (#numeroCarga#, #oidRegion#, #oidZona#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.COD_PAGO CODIGO, A.COD_PAGO || ' - ' || A.DES_PAGO DESCRIPCION FROM INC_CONCU_PAGOS_PARAM A WHERE A.EST_REGI = 1 ORDER BY A.CAM_INIC DESC
SELECT A.COD_TIPO_ABON CODIGO, A.COD_TIPO_ABON || ' - ' || A.DES_TIPO_ABON DESCRIPCION FROM INC_CONCU_PAGOS_TIPO_ABONO A WHERE A.EST_REGI = 1 ORDER BY 2
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INC_RECEP_TRANS_PAGO_CONCU ( NUM_CARG, NUM_FILA, NUM_CONC, NUM_DOCU, COD_CLIE, VAL_MONT, FEC_ABON, EST_ABON, FEC_CARG, COD_USUA) VALUES (#numeroCarga#, #numeroFila#, #numeroConcurso#, #numeroDocumento#, #codigoCliente#, #montoAbono#, #fechaAbono#, #estadoAbono#, SYSDATE, #codigoUsuario#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(NUM_CARG) + 1, 1) AS NUM_CARGA FROM INC_RECEP_TRANS_PAGO_CONCU
